database.name: VIEW M_PRODUCT_WAREHOUSE_QTYS_V
database.view: SELECT sd.m_product_id, sd.m_warehouse_id, sd.qtyonhand, COALESCE(s.qtyordered, 0) AS qtyordered, COALESCE(s.qtyreserved, 0) AS qtyreserved FROM (SELECT sdd.m_product_id, l.m_warehouse_id, sum(sdd.qtyonhand) AS qtyonhand FROM m_storage_detail sdd JOIN m_locator l ON sdd.m_locator_id = l.m_locator_id GROUP BY sdd.m_product_id, l.m_warehouse_id) sd LEFT JOIN (SELECT sp.m_product_id, sp.m_warehouse_id, sum(sp.qtyordered) AS qtyordered, sum(sp.qtyreserved) AS qtyreserved FROM m_storage_pending sp GROUP BY sp.m_product_id, sp.m_warehouse_id) s ON sd.m_product_id = s.m_product_id AND sd.m_warehouse_id = s.m_warehouse_id
